name: Log in with invalid credentials

statusDetails.message: AssertionError: assert 'error' in {'errorMessage': 'User does not exist.'}

description:
As a user
I want to sign up and log in to the system
So that I can access protected features

steps.name: Given I am not a registered user
When I send a login request with incorrect credentials
Then I should receive an error message
